articles.title: How giant camera sensors help and hinder your smartphone photography - Android Central
articles.description: The massive cameras in modern flagships allow you to take photos with stunning bokeh and great low light performance, but they can also make it hard to keep your subject fully in focus.
articles.content:
Source: Andrew Martonik / Android Central
